name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn Off YouTube Autoplay Next & Annotations

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn off YouTube autoplay next video and disable YouTube annotations on videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn off YouTube autoplay next video and/or turn off YouTube annotations. Hides the toggle option when disabled.

Compatible with desktop, mobile, and embedded YouTube videos.

For more features including removing recommendations, comments, and more: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/unhook-remove-youtube-rec/khncfooichmfjbepaaaebmommgaepoid

Turn Off YouTube Autoplay Next & Annotations is also available on:
- Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/youtube-autoplay-annotations/
- Microsoft Edge: https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/turn-off-youtube-autoplay/apdogalndjbldgojpfofdcdlmblgpjef
